abilities.name: Extra Protection
abilities.text: As long as you have Illumise in play, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Volbeat by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon-ex.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.
